message: I would like to hear more about it.
I have a close friend who runs imorganic.org and weaddup.com - both of which are aligned with OG farming and clothing. What's your interest.
I m keen on starting UP a organic farming setup from india. waitng for right ppl to join in..wat r ur thoughts on it.
I have a friend that is working with our local government here to help convert farms into organic.
@newalexandria Wow, those are nice sites. I'm especially fond of weaddup.com. Thanks for sharing.
thanks everyone :) well we are just getting into it, so want to know as much as possible.
@newalexandria: thanx for sharing links...actually just now we are more into no soil farming(hydroponics).
